title: How to Remove an Effect in Adobe Illustrator

steps.title: Create an object and apply the effect.
steps.content: Create an object and apply the effect. The example below features a 3D effect.

steps.title: Click on the object.
steps.content: Click on the object. Follow this path: Window > Appearance

steps.title: When the Appearance box appears, click on the effect you wish to remove.
steps.content: When the Appearance box appears, click on the effect you wish to remove. Then click on the Clear Appearance button (2nd from left on bottom of palette).

steps.title: Your effect has been removed.
steps.content: Your effect has been removed. Simply reverse the process to add the effect back.
